author: chamikara
msg: Updated the AxisEngine.flowComplete method to call all the Handlers even if exceptions get thrown.
First exception will be thrown out after invoking all the Handlers, the rest will be logged.
Added Licence to some source files.

author: cdupoirieux
msg: Styles with Oasis Open Document format is a little more complex to manage than I though at the beginning. We have to parse styles inheritance in different xml files to find what is exactly the current layout and the algorithm is not recursive as we should have expected with xml.
The fact is this stylesheet fully manage styles inheritance.
The only problem I have is when two tags nearly have the same styles in the document because every layout tags in the resulting xhtml (em, strong...) are closed and then reopened.
I am looking to compare the next styles with the current to know what tag to close and what tag to let open. But actually, I am not sure I can do this...

author: gnodet
msg: XBEAN-82: Support flat maps, dups policies and default keys
